ISSUE.TITLE: Shift-click selection selects hidden interfaces
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Deployment Type Self-hosted ### NetBox Version v4.2.3 ### Python Version 3.12 ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Create Device. 2. Create physical interface "et-0/0/0". 3. Create virtual interface "et-0/0/0.0". 4. Create physical interface "et-0/0/1". 5. Enable "Hide virtual interfaces". 6. Toggle selection check boxes of physical interfaces using Shift-click. 7. Show virtual interfaces again. ### Expected Behavior Only the physical interfaces should be selected. This would be consistent with the usage of the "Select all" check box. ### Observed Behavior The virtual interfaces "between" the selected physical interfaces are also selected.
